welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kuriyama, Japan! Nestled in the beautiful mountains of Hokkaido, our charming city is known for its breathtaking scenery, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Kuriyama has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Chitose Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access the free WiFi network for up to 3 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Okadama Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Okadama Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
